short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes the embedded Twitch stream on lolesports.com to a different channel.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your Worlds 2024 viewing experience with this extension! Easily swap the embedded stream on lolesports.com to watch your favorite co-streamers, all while staying eligible for exclusive drops and rewards!
